alert.note: Alert for Northumberland; Richmond; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Northumberland, central Richmond and southeastern Westmoreland Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kinsale, or over Callao, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warsaw, Callao, Kinsale, Hague, Lewisetta, Heathsville, Haynesville, Westmoreland, Lottsburg, Threeway, Mount Holly, Lyells, Middletons Corner, Dodlyt, Piney Grove, Templeman, Lara, Ethel, Village and Oldhams. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
